# storyboard

**Instance Property**

The storyboard from which the view controller was loaded.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var storyboard: NSStoryboard? { get }
```

## Discussion

If the view controller was not loaded from a storyboard, the value of this property is `nil`.

## Using a Storyboard

- **dismiss(_:)**
title: storyboard
